contents:
376 Trump deported roughly 145,000 in his first 6 months, as per ICE via FOIA. This is NOT mass deportation. posted 5 days ago by Crucible 52 comments award share download report block
52 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web 1 Simple Hack to Cut Your Electric Bill (Try Tonight) GadgetCyno genericamerican69 19 points 5 days ago Biden imported 5 million in that time permalink award report block reply Toohershat 3 points 4 days ago True, and yet I'm sure it's important to understand the context - it's a lot easier to open the border and allow millions in than it is to organize mass deportations. Just like it's easier to destroy something than it is to build it. permalink parent award report block reply booblitchutz 1 points 4 days ago Well and with every lever of bureaucracy turned against deportations, too permalink parent award report block reply HoodooOperator 0 points 4 days ago Comment removed by community moderators. permalink parent award report block reply BurtMcGirt 16 points 5 days ago How many new illegals are being spawned every six months? Are we even reducing the number factoring in new ones getting in/overstaying visas/being spawned? permalink award report block reply snoopy3210 4 points 4 days ago There’s almost no addition, and Mark Dice forgot to mention the self deportations, which are real and massive. You also have to do it properly, as you don’t want to be stopped in court. It’s on a good pace. permalink parent award report block reply PegasoSeiya 5 points 4 days ago Self deportations are increasing like crazy. Before you would say you’re gonna fight your asylum case, get scheduled for 4 years later, and released. Now you don’t he released, assigned to the toughest judges (that are the ones assigned to detained clients) and end up
Either detained for 4 months and then deported, or you can choose voluntary departure and get removed within a month to your country. Family usually follows permalink parent award report block reply BurtMcGirt 1 points 4 days ago If we are "on a good pace", approximately in which year will we be below the number of illegals who were here at the beginning of 2021? Also, I'm assuming "no addition" doesn't include illegals reproducing, which they do. permalink parent award report block reply Spiritof2015 11 points 5 days ago https://www.ice.gov/careers permalink award report block reply GainesvilleFlorida 6 points 4 days ago I know someone that applied over a month ago and hasn’t heard back or even an email. permalink parent award report block reply grassshrimp 11 points 5 days ago They aren't being deported fast enough! So elect Democrats to open the borders back up again! Republican logic. permalink award report block reply possibletower -3 points 5 days ago Mark Dice and OP are cucked faggots who are actually Democrats I also see no documentation proving the allegation. Showing that faggot Mark Dice's comment is not the FOIA document that supposedly proves the numbers. permalink parent award report block reply madisonmaga 2 points 4 days ago Dice is not saying that people shouldn't vote for GOP. He's warning that voters might not bother to vote for the GOP even though we need them to do so. There's a difference. permalink parent award report block reply RememberCharlieKirk 8 points 5 days ago Deportation is the compromise. Throughout history, invasions were met with physical (bloody) resistance. This modern sort of invaders do not realize how good they have it. permalink award report block reply Stolen 7 points 5 days ago 483 a day. That is way below 3000. permalink award report block reply Crucible OP 7 points 5 days ago 30,000 per day to make any significant difference. permalink parent award report block reply MastaJoda 2 points 4 days ago Yeah, but have you seen the egg prices, bigot? permalink parent award report block reply Roadpower 6 points 5 days ago It needs to be a conveyor belt. Or do the filibuster and set things up so that they are deporting themselves by the boatload. permalink award report block reply Seeker_17 5 points 5 days ago Disappointing. They should increase the pressure to get more self deportations. I also want them to focus on muzzies. permalink award report block reply genericamerican69 9 points 5 days ago They need to focus on Indians. They are cannibalising every industry and corporation. Not the copout "Muslim Indians" that the "based Hindus" keep trying to blame everything on. permalink parent award report block reply treadelsewhere 4 points 4 days ago It literally needs to be 2.5 million in 6 months, just to break even with Biden permalink award report block reply MastaJoda 2 points 4 days ago Best we can do is cheap eggs, bigot.
